title: Waterfall
rule: Starting with the player that drew the card, each player starts drinking at the same time as the person on their left. NO player can stop drinking until the player before them stops.

title: You
rule: Pick anyone to take a drink.

title: Floor
rule: Last person to touch the floor takes a drink.

title: Make a rule
rule: Have fun! Make any rule you wish. That rule will be in effect until a player breaks the rule.

title: Chicks
rule: All girls at the table drink.

title: Dicks
rule: All guys at the table drink.

title: Heaven
rule: Raise your hand above your head and touch the heavens! Last person to do so takes a drink.

title: Mate
rule: Pick someone to be your mate. For the rest of the game, they drink when you drink.

title: Rhyme
rule: Pick a word, the next player needs to pick a word that rhymes. This continues until a player can't think of a word or reuses a word. That player drinks.

title: Categories
rule: Pick a category! Players must go around in a circle and name something that falls within the category. This continues until a player can't think of something. That player drinks.

title: Never Have I Ever
rule: Play "Never Have I ever" with 5 or 10 fingers, player's choice!

title: Question Master
rule: You're the question master! If you ask a question to a player and they answer, that player drinks. This continues until someone answers the question master or when the next Queen is drawn.
